title: Matthew Hornbach: A Change of Fortune for the U.S. Dollar?
description: Consensus on the dollar has been bearish for years, only to be proven wrong time after time. But Global Head of Macro Strategy Matthew Hornbach says the mechanics of supply and demand could change that outcome.
